channel.title: How to Download A Sorces (The Right Way)
channel.description:
[b]Downloading Sorces The Right Way![/b]
First You should always scan the file (evan if someone has already) second If its safe down load it third after that a thing well pop up click on sorce name and left click all files and click select all fourth In the top of that page well say extract, Extract it to a file fith after u have done that open the file that u extract it to and click Run Server.
THEN YOU ARE DONE =)
Please post or i well take off information

item.title: How to Download A Sorces (The Right Way)
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“panthers_08, post:1, topic:190209”]Downloading Sources The Right Way!

First You should always scan the file (even if someone has already)
Second If its safe download it.
Third after that a thing will pop up, click on source and allame(<<WTF) and left click files and click select all.
Fourth In the top of that page well say extract, Extract it to a file.
Fith after you have done that open the file that u extract it to and click Run Server.

THEN YOU ARE DONE =)

Please post or i well take off information[/quote]

Haha raped.The bold letters are corrections :).

Read full topic
